name: The game where you catch pumpkins
name_original: The game where you catch pumpkins
description:
Happy Halloween

A small game where you catch pumpkins and get points.

How to play

Pumpkins start falling and spawning faster the higher score you have. If you let a pumpkin drop to the ground - you lose. 

Avoid rotten pumpkins, collecting these will also make you lose.

Controls
  • Left Arrow/A; Right Arrow/D - Move
  • Space - Sprint
  • R - Reset
  • M - Mute music (I made it just so there is some, it doesn't really fit imo)
  • B - Toggle colored background
Info

Made by Xeight(me) in a week before Halloween. 

Made using Haxe language and HaxeFlixel framework. Sound effects generated with ChipTone. Music made with BeepBox. Sprites drawn with Aseprite.
